lab

I am a co-founder of the Connected_Politics Lab, an interdisciplinary hub for researchers using computational methods to study politics. The lab is hosted by the School of Politics and International Relations (SPIRe) at UCD.

The Connected_Politics Lab is an interdisciplinary hub for researchers using computational methods to study politics and society. Faculty affiliated with the Connected_Politics Lab teach in the new MSc Programme in Politics and Data Science.

Bi-monthly Connected_Politics Lab meetings are scheduled for Wednesdays 2:00 - 3:00 PM throughout teaching terms. During these meetings, we welcome guest speakers, discuss new research ideas, and bring together a diverse group of scholars with an interest in computational social and political science.
